divs: Sighting Detailsi was on the porch with my cousin smoking a cigg we were talking and i looked up and i seen a light the light moved very slow then it like looked like light were turned on from one end to the other but went out as they past then it vanished and i dont even know a word for how fast i wanted to tell my cousin but come on how is it gonna sound then it appeared again about i guess 30 miles miles it was a full head spin from one side to the other im not good with distances and then i told him and he thinks im crazy. i let it go and then i went on facebook and one of my friends posted something and he said he didnt wanna sound crazy and one of his friends commented that they seen it too i dk if they wanna make it known but i never thought i would see what i seen today i even tried to come up with an explanation to myself cause i cant believe i seen that i always thought it would be cool but it actually has me up still at 3:03am thinking about it looking online if anyone else seen it....(I AM NOT CRAZY I KNOW WHAT I SEEN) im glad theres a site to let other people know you have more resources then i do you can find out if other people seen it too i line in bayonne new jersey and from where i was sitting on the porch if i was looking directly down towards the bayonne bridge it was off to the far left really far out and it was still pretty big like i said i dont know distance but it was far and big then after it did that light circle thing it did it just completely disappeared and then i looked all the way right and i seen it again then it was just gone. thank you im putting 3 witnesses under but im not sure if they seen what i seen.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bayonne
There were no other sightings in Bayonne on or around September 19th 2013
Summary: it looked circular a light flashed around it it vanished re-appeared about 30 miles south
